wikipedia_page.main: Jocky Robertson (21 May 1926 – 2004) was a Scottish footballer who played as a goalkeeper for Armadale Thistle, Third Lanark and Berwick Rangers despite being of notably short height.

response: * Jocky Robertson (1926–2004), former Scottish footballer who played for Third Lanark and Berwick Rangers
